name: Space Sleuth
description: Space Sleuth is a 3D point and click adventure targeting PC and eventually touch screen devices. (This version is playable on PC). Play as Detective Donaldson aboard the MarsX spaceship, enlisted to find missing crew member, Marley. As Detective Donaldson, the player must interrogate crew members and uncover the clues and events that led to Marley's disappearance.
